General.Name: Golden Share Resources Corp
General.Description: Golden Share Resources Corporation engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral resources in Canada. It primarily explores for base metals, copper, nickel, and diamond deposits. The company's primary assets are the Ogoki project, which comprise ten non-contiguous claim blocks with 30 MLAS mining claims located in the James Bay Lowlands of Ontario; Kagiami project that consists five small non-contiguous blocks that include 45 MLAS mining claims located in the James Bay Lowlands of Ontario. The company was formerly known as Golden Share Mining Corporation and changed its name to Golden Share Resources Corporation in June 2017. Golden Share Resources Corporation is based in Markham, Canada.
General.Address: 7-145 Riviera Drive, Markham, ON, Canada, L3R 5J6
